name: Tafco Vinyl Single Hung Window with Screen, 24x30, White
description: The Tafco Single Hung Vinyl Window, 24 in. wide x 30 in. tall , White, with Single Glass and Screen features an interlocking weather-tight and solid construction that will deliver superior performance. A built-in J-channel accepts all types of sidings for versatile installation.
